mentionedBy.name: HashiCorp Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Open source competitor to Vault that emerged after HashiCorp's license change. Provides end-to-end secret management including encrypted version-controlled storage, dynamic secrets, integrations, and certificate lifecycle management.

2025.note: Open source competitor to Vault that emerged after HashiCorp's license change. Provides end-to-end secret management including encrypted version-controlled storage, dynamic secrets, integrations, and certificate lifecycle management.
